detectors.description: Proxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.0/70643f0dfba856071d335678df7ed332ffd6e3be_BeaconProxyCDP.sol/70643f0dfba856071d335678df7ed332ffd6e3be_BeaconProxyCDP.sol#23-88) is a proxy, but doesn't seem upgradeable.

BeaconProxyCDP (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.0/70643f0dfba856071d335678df7ed332ffd6e3be_BeaconProxyCDP.sol/70643f0dfba856071d335678df7ed332ffd6e3be_BeaconProxyCDP.sol#91-95) may be an upgradeable proxy.
implementation is declared in the proxy.
 uses Unstructured Storage
 uses non-standard slot: bytes32(uint256(1))
Proxy._delegate(address).implementation (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.0/70643f0dfba856071d335678df7ed332ffd6e3be_BeaconProxyCDP.sol/70643f0dfba856071d335678df7ed332ffd6e3be_BeaconProxyCDP.sol#47) gets value from a cross-contract call: IBeacon(_NPics_).implementations(_CDP_SHARD_)
IBeacon appears to be a Registry contract for the proxy
The address of IBeacon is stored as a state variable: Constants._NPics_
_NPics_ is constant, so the Registry address cannot be upgraded.
No setter functions found to search for compatibility checks.
